channel.title: Help with weapons
channel.description:
title explain everything just answer these questions
1. how can i make so i can ses the weapon i att with. like when i att with bandos whip when i hit the whip gets invisible and then return after the hit how do i get the weapon so i can see it while i att. i know i need animations but where do i find it and where do i paste it?
2. how to change the hit like it hit up in 75-90 bandos whip
3. how to make recolors of a weapon i know i need to change a number or two but can someone tell me all the color codes. i know black is 0 so.
thx for reading plz answer
